Transformations¶

class lena.transformation.GenericTransformation(method: Callable[[lena.types.ActionDataT], lena.types.ActionDataT], description: Optional[str] = None, name: Optional[str] = None)[source]¶

Utility action which allows modification of ~lena.entities.ActionData “on the fly” (usually by lambda functions)

class lena.transformation.RenameActionField(key: str, new_key: str)[source]¶

Change name of the registered entity

class lena.transformation.Transformation(description: Optional[str] = None, name: Optional[str] = None)[source]¶

Base class for actions which modify data

async async_run(action_data: lena.types.ActionDataT) → lena.types.ActionDataT[source]¶

Method which is executed when running the action pipeline

Note that each override of this function have to implement “skipping logic” to support Return functionality.

def run(self, action_data: ActionDataT) -> ActionDataT:
    if action_data.skip_processing:
        return action_data

    # normal implementation of the action
    ...
Parameters

action_data – Data container passed by actions

Returns

Last version of ~lena.entities.ActionData after execution

run(action_data: lena.types.ActionDataT) → lena.types.ActionDataT[source]¶

Method which is executed when running the action pipeline

Note that each override of this function have to implement “skipping logic” to support Return functionality.

def run(self, action_data: ActionDataT) -> ActionDataT:
    if action_data.skip_processing:
        return action_data

    # normal implementation of the action
    ...
Parameters

action_data – Data container passed by actions

Returns

Last version of :class:~lena.entities.ActionData after execution
